chunk:
GROWN ALCHEMIST Regenerating Eye Cream

Brand: Grown Alchemist

Category: Around Eye Cream

Ingredients: Water/Aqua/Eau, Vitis Vinifera (Grape) Seed Oil, Glyceryl Stearate, Dicaprylyl Carbonate, Cetyl Alcohol, Cetearyl Olivate, Heptyl Undecylenate, Sorbitan Olivate, Glycerin, 1,2-Hexanediol, Camellia Kissi Seed Oil, Butylene Glycol, Saccharide Isom

col, Saccharide Isomerate, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Lactobacillus Ferment Lysate, Punica Granatum Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Sodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Xanthan Gum, Potassium Sorbate, Citric Acid, Lactobacillus Ferment, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Tocopherol, Maltodextrin, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Ca

ensis Leaf Juice, Caffeine, Myristyl Alcohol, Stearyl Alcohol, Nephelium Lappaceum Extract, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Oil, Sodium Citrate, Centella Asiatica Extract, Arginine/Lysine Polypeptide.

Directions: Apply a small amount to cleansed skin and dab gently around the eye area until absorbed. Use daily.​

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immu
GH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
